name: Demon's Heir
description:
REQUIRES A MOUSE AND KEYBOARD TO PLAY

Armed with only a katana, Beewee the ninja cat aspires to be the most powerful that he can.

- Face 4 levels and bosses with nail-biting difficulty
- Escape tough situations with airtight controls
- Run against the clock with the speedrun timer
- Revel in every piece of newfound power
